alert.note: Alert for Clinch; Echols; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Northeastern Charlton; Southern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued January 17 at 1:40AM EST until January 18 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... ...HARD FREEZE WATCH IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 possible. * WHERE...Inland Glynn, Echols, Clinch, Inland Camden, Northeastern Charlton, Southern Ware and Western Charlton Counties. * WHEN...For the Hard Freeze Warning, until 9 AM EST this morning. For the Freeze Watch, from this evening through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Clinch; Echols; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Northeastern Charlton; Southern Ware; Western Charlton
